price: Ka sε: Medeε Nyankopͻn na mede nokorε som no, de m’anidie ne ahobraseε ma no.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
